CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Among the variety of conjugated polymers that have been studied , poly(p-phenylenevinylene) ( PPV ) , 2 poly(alkylfluorene) ( PF ) , and polythiophene ( PT ) 3 derivatives are typical p - type electron donor materials.

Let's think step by step.

1. poly(p-phenylenevinylene) ( PPV )
2. poly(alkylfluorene) ( PF )
3. polythiophene ( PT )

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are: poly(p-phenylenevinylene), poly(alkylfluorene), and polythiophene. These are all names of conjugated polymer materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. poly(p-phenylenevinylene) ( PPV )
2. poly(alkylfluorene) ( PF )
3. polythiophene ( PT )

After removing irrelevant entities, the remaining entities clearly refer to Material Names. These are the names of the conjugated polymer materials being discussed in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
